alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 11:51PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coffee and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1150 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Broxton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen and West Green. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
